keyword: how many calories in a spicy chick fil a sandwich
title: How Many Calories in a Spicy Chick-fil-A Sandwich?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a spicy chick fil a sandwich—about 450 kcal—plus full nutrition breakdown, macros, and tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Spicy Chick-fil-A Sandwich?
assumptions: Standard Chick-fil-A Spicy Chicken Sandwich: spicy breaded chicken filet, toasted bun, pickles; no sides, sauces, or modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations; values based on official Chick-fil-A data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: A Spicy Chick-fil-A Sandwich packs ~450 kcal with 28 g protein and 45 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a spicy Chick-fil-A sandwich?
faqs.a: Approximately 450 kcal for the standard version.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a spicy chick fil a sandwich?
How much sodium is in a spicy Chick-fil-A sandwich?
faqs.a: Roughly 1,700 mg, mostly from breading and pickles.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in a spicy chick fil a sandwich?
faqs.a: Yes, 45 g total carbs, including 2 g fiber and 5 g sugars from the bun.

faqs.q: How does the spicy version compare to regular Chick-fil-A sandwich calories?
faqs.a: Spicy is similar at ~440-450 kcal; slight difference due to breading.
